titleStmt.title: Logopandecteision, or, An introdvction to the vniversal langvage digested into these six several books, Neaudethaumata, Chrestasbeia, Cleronomaporia, Chryseomystes, Nelcadicastes, & Philoponauxesis / by Sir Thomas Urquhart of Cromartie ...
titleStmt.author: Urquhart, Thomas, Sir, 1611-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Giles Calvert ... and by Richard Tomlins ...,

notesStmt.note: "Now lately contrived and published both for his own utilities and that of all pregnant and ingenious spirits."
Reproduction of original in British Library.
